name: pikmin-bloom-checklist
description: A checklist to help you keep track of which type of Decor Pikmin you have collected in the Pikmin Bloom game.

scripts.deploy: next build && next export && git checkout gh-pages && cd out && cp -r * ../ && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: deploy to gh-pages" && git push && cd .. && git checkout main
